.b-groupbar .b-chip:last-child.title: Tree grouping
.b-groupbar .b-chip:last-child.content: Drag-drop a column header here to group the Gantt tree structure

.b-grid-row.b-linked[data-index=\"5\"].title: Manually scheduled
.b-grid-row.b-linked[data-index=\"5\"].content: All tasks are flagged as being manually scheduled when grouping, to maintain correct dates
